actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to reinstate the originally authorized lost sharing rules of the Missouri National Recreation River.

summary.text: Reinstates the originally authorized cost-sharing rules of the Missouri National Recreation River, Nebraska and South Dakota. Requires cost-sharing ambiguities to be resolved according to National Park Service policies as applied to units of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to reinstate the originally authorized lost sharing rules of the Missouri National Recreation River.
